                  <jats:p>
                    Here, we report the draft genome sequence of
                    <jats:italic>Pseudomonas umsongensis</jats:italic>

items.abstract:
<jats:title>ABSTRACT</jats:title>
                  <jats:p>
                    We present here the draft genome sequence of
                    <jats:italic>Sphingopyxis bauzanensis</jats:italic>
                    DSM 22271. The assembly contains 4,258,005 bp in 28 scaffolds and has a GC content of 63.3%. A series of specific genes involved in the catabolism or transport of aromatic compounds was identified.
                  </jats:p>
title:
Draft Genome Sequence of the Type Strain
                    Sphingopyxis bauzanensis
                    DSM 22271
